features: 1. √ [PROTECTS FROM HARMFUL SURROUNDING]: Wifi router also has much radiation, especially we use it everyday. It will badly affect our health in such a surrounding for a long time. It is necessary for every family to own this router cover. The Wi-Fi Router Cover is designed to block about 90%-95% of electromagnetic field and radio frequency emitted by routers all day long.

2. √ [BETTER PROTECTION MATERIAL]: Our WiFi Router Cover is made of breathable and visible faraday fabric that allows a natural air flow for cooling, dissipating heat quickly.Just tuck around the entire router for the greatest amount of reduce of harmful,you may only partially place onto the router antennas. It could perfectly protect us from harmful releasing from wifi router.

3. √ [TWO SIDES OPENING--DIFFERENT LEVELS PROTECTION]: The router cover is designed with two sides opening design. You could choose to close or open the cover to meet different levels protection. The closer, the protection will be better, the shielding performance is stronger, if you still want to get wifi signal, we suggest no complete closing.

4. √ [BIG SIZE MEETS MOST ROUTERS]: The size of the wifi cover is 13.8IN * 15.7IN, it is big enough and is suitable for both Wifi routers with or without antenna and for most types of routers in the markets. Owning this wifi router, you don’t need to worry about harmful radiation, you could cover it when sleeping for a sound sleep.

5. √ [100% SATISFACTION]: This wifi router Cover is proved to reduce harmful signal. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, simply return it to Amazon within 30 days for a full money-back refund. And any questions about the product, just send us email and we will spare no efforts to solve it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It is a wifi cover, but also your health partner. This cover is made by visible copper/nickle faraday fabric which has better blocking effect than other normal faraday fabric. It could fantasticly reduce the harmful from wifi rotuer to make sure us a healthier and comfortable living and working environment.

You need to know the affection of radiation to our health Radiation from our living and working environment may affect our health silently. No matter the size of the device, its radiation affects us more or less for a long time. It is harmful for not only our body health, but also our spirit. While this wifi cover could help us get relaxed and happier.

Big Size + Thoughtful Two Sides Opening Design The wifi cover is very big of size 13.5IN * 9.8IN. It could be used on almost all different kinds of routers. And you could also choose different level covering the rotuer antenna to get various shiedling performance.

For Different Occasions Usage The wifi router cover could not only used in your house, but also your working office. When you have a travel and sleep in the hotel, you could also take it with you for further protection.
Closing Two Ends for Complete Shielding Please note that: the wifi cover shielding performance is very good. When you wrap your device completely with no gap, the blocking will be the most.
Conductivity proves Its Protection The fabric is conductive, you could cover it over your phone and touch your photo screen. It still works. The conductivity means its difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for price
reviews.reviewText: Used for router cover to lower signal strenth. Great seller!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Jury still out, arrived today, set up completed and testing
reviews.reviewText: Arrived looks conductive (not instrument measured for conductivity), threaded metal like material with very close thread counts. Placed over router with a wifi laptop being monitored, no impact or loss of signal with both open ends just sliding over the router, large enough to fit over router with wires leaving plenty of room (my model router). Used copper conductive tape to seal one side, and slid back over router, signal seems same. Purpose of this experiment is to see if less flu-like symptoms suffered by household at night with a 5Ghz and 2.5Ghz signal. Wife uses wifi laptop several other less important items, so doesn't like it turned off at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am confident it is blocking RF waves
reviews.reviewText: I am confident the cover is blocking RF waves but have not given it a meter test since installation. My friend brought a meter over and the reading was off the chart in our living room. I would like to update this post once I do another reading. I did have to modify the cover to fit my WIFI router by undoing the stitching on the long side half way down and open up the short side to slip it over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but reduces WiFi range.
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking to block or limit EMF it works well but in my case some of the devices on my wireless network struggled. If you live or work in a small area this would probably be worthwhile but not if you and your devices are spread out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work
reviews.reviewText: We have the trifield emf reader and tested the emf before and after using this product. The emf levels did not drop even 1%. We tried it in different arrangements around the router, tucked in completely, wrapped around all sides, etc. No configuration decreased the emf signal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Easy to open up for extra strength to WIFI connections. Had it too closed and adjusted to have the crawl space dehumidifier pick up signals. Also blocked some of the HVAC WIFI, but adjusted with a more open top, works like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Economical and effective
reviews.reviewText: It actually works!Before using the bag my router and modem were putting out measurements close to 100 (safe reading is 5). Both router and modem fit in the large EMF bag and have proper ventilation. To minimize radiation leaking, I sealed it with a rubber band. Signal strength is still strong within the room but has been weakened beyond that. EMF reading with meter is not zeroed out but it remains within the "safe" zone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Move over 10 foil, this thing works great
reviews.reviewText: This thing blocks a lot of the RF frequency but still allows you to connect to your Wi-Fi, which is awesome. If you’re sensitive to those kind of things this may be a help to you
